entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. A few flurries beginning this morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 11 March 2023
